content: skill level easy advanced beginner finished size height - 74 cm 29 in width - 164 cm 64 5 in you can adjust the length of the shawl by adding or subtracting pattern repeats materials used fingering weight yarn 4 ply size 1 - super fine i used mclana bobbel farbverlaufsgarn 4-fach yarn 200 grams / 750 meters in color 8581 1 skein of yarn needed for this pattern 4 mm crochet hook youtube link 1 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=pqgjvfoykdg&t=1s
